title: NASA Data Helps Maine Oyster Farmers Choose Where to Grow
description: NASA satellites are helping Maine oyster farmers pick better sites and plan when oysters will be ready to harvest.
content: NASA satellites are helping Maine oyster farmers pick better sites and plan when oysters will be ready to harvest.
